name: Paper Spirits
description:
Paper Spirits is a tiny atmopsheric game about helping those who are lost.

Play time: Less than 5 minutes

Controls:

  • Move/strafe - WASD/QE
  • Look around - Mouse (not required)
  • Exit - Escape

Credits

galaxybat and sponge

Attributions

  • Music from Ambience Music Pack by JDSherbert
  • Sound effect by https://shapeforms.itch.io/shapeforms-audio-free-sfx
  • Silver font by Poppy Works
